category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_show_non_condition_templates
preference.preference_description: Controls the results of Condition based Workflow Template filtering shown in the Workflow create/submit panels, specifically whether we show or hide Workflow Templates that have no associated BMIDE Condition filter. Valid Values: * true: Show workflow templates on which condition is not defined. * false: Hide workflow templates on which condition is not defined. This is default value.
